answers.answer: If you're eating an excessive amount of foods with beta carotene that could be a cause. It can also be due to conditions such as diabetes. You may want to check with your doc.

question: I have recently noticed that my fingernails were yellow around the cuticle and base, and now, I just noticed my palms are yellow as well. What could cause my hands to turn yellow.This discussion is related to/posts/show/236457.
title: yellow palms
